data.text: @mochagirl73 @pamcho3 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa She didn't owe him 💩 either.  She didn't disrespect him which is all that matters.
@Anna59158890 @kkschiller @michaelstrahan @RyanSeacrest She definitely has a following. It's obvious who was actually lending the comedic timing to the show. Now it's dry and boring to me anyway.
@Anna59158890 @kkschiller @michaelstrahan @RyanSeacrest It's painful to me. I used to laugh a lot while watching when Michael was there. I don't even laugh a little bit now so I rarely watch.
@Anna59158890 @kkschiller @michaelstrahan @RyanSeacrest That's for appearance sake. They say long distance marriages work for some. I couldn't do it. If they're happy cheers to them.

@Anna59158890 @kkschiller @michaelstrahan @RyanSeacrest Ryan wanted another check and she wanted a "yes" man. I guess they both got what they wanted for now. He's very passive aggressive and those type of people explode after a matter of time. Tick tock....

@Anna59158890 @kkschiller @michaelstrahan @RyanSeacrest I haven't looked at her the same since that childish debacle. Now she and Ryan looked so fake and forced. Her insincere attempt at being a friend makes me want to vomit. I think it's a reason her husband is always working on another coast. He doesn't like her either. 😂
@kkschiller I hear that show is so bad anyway. Does anybody really watch  it? Can't believe it's still on the air?
@kkschiller When you know who someone did it vs when you know someone who would never do that. Michael vs Ryan

@yldrose @Ms_Politic @kkschiller I am blocking the idiot too #Ethereal. It's a new day & i can't today #Ughhh

@ElizabetKaren60 @jennah_justen @kkschiller Kelly’s show could be cancelled at any time, whereas GMA isn’t going anywhere & is overall more popular, which I think is what Michael found enticing. And yes, Kelly’s true self isn’t what we see on the show everyday. He wasn’t happy at LIVE or he would’ve stayed
@ElizabetKaren60 @jennah_justen @kkschiller ya me too LOL!!!
@havinsalexa @jennah_justen @kkschiller Yes, I was.

@willishl @tontonlove @kkschiller @KellyRipa No worries. I only know what I've read. If there was animosity between her & Strahan, I never picked up on it. I just think she deserved to know, just like anyone else would whose work mate was leaving. As for Seacrest, I didn't know about that situation until yesterday.
@brownsbutterfly @mochagirl73 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa I don't have the inside scoop. How do you know this? Why the big secret? Who cares?

@pamcho3 @tontonlove @kkschiller @KellyRipa I think soaps are cool too (my mom use to watch AMC and OLTL back in the day and I remember her character) and certainly believe that it takes a lot of work to produce them. I apologize for coming off as a bit cynical. I just think her attitude toward michael vs ryan is odd to me
@willishl @tontonlove @kkschiller @KellyRipa If you recall, many people tried out for that job. KR won the tryouts. Kathy Lee didn't hand her anything. It was unwatchable with KL and Regis.
@60DEGREEWEATHER @kkschiller No one is trying to start “race wars” and that’s not what pointing out a simple fact is.

@willishl @tontonlove @kkschiller @KellyRipa She got the talk show gig because her character was playing a talk she host and ABC was impressed. Yes  I guess soaps are the bottom, but consider that they crank out 300+ shows/ year compared to how long it takes to make a prime time show or a film, they are amazing .

@pamcho3 @mochagirl73 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa They asked him  to keep the move to GMA quiet until they chose to announce it? Should he have betrayed his employers request to make her feel better? Kelly doesn’t sign his paychecks ABC does.

@tontonlove @pamcho3 @kkschiller @KellyRipa Remember, Kelly came from a soap opera, "All My Children" and although it's steady work, for an actor, it's "Bottom of the barrel" work. so her being thrown these scraps (hosting a mediocre talk show) was a step up for her career (and probably where she'll stay until retirement).

@tontonlove @pamcho3 @kkschiller @KellyRipa Even if he didnt tell her,credible sexual assault allegations is a lot more serious than someone deciding to take a better job and not telling their co-worker.Kelly Ripa is a diva and her only cash-cow is the sloppy seconds of a talk show that was handed down to her from KathyLee
@wtfjag @kkschiller @yldrose He didn’t go to court, so no, he was not found “not guilty.”
@kkschiller She is all for self she treated Regis like shit too  after he left smh haven’t spoken to the man sense.
@kkschiller Apples and oranges?

@pamcho3 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa Strahan gave Kelly Ripa 6 months notice of his intent to leave Live. That's not blindsiding by any measure. And she treated him like garbage afterward while she makes public pronouncements of support for Seacrest.

@msorvam @rocketgirlup @pamcho3 @mochagirl73 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa Right, so the big black man not alerting his coworker about a move is somehow more dishonorable + unprofessional than the little white guy creating hostile work environments + sexually harassing... that’s the logic I’m seeing. White people being dumpster muppets per usual.

@wtfjag @kkschiller @yldrose It’s hard to believe you truly care about something being proven when you don’t seem to share the same outrage over the fact that E! refused to interview ppl that corroborated the witness story during their investigation. Do you only use that as a defense to let the accused free?
@kkschiller @IWriteAllDay_ Oh shit. I didn’t even think about this.
@rocketgirlup @pamcho3 @mochagirl73 @willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa No he OWED her nothing!  Would it have been nice, maybe, but as an obligation..hell no.

@kkschiller It wasn't so much Michael doing as t was the network bossez6. He was instructed not to disclose any info. Kelly never had a very close relationship w Regis Philbin either. I don think they've spoken since he's left the show.

But, with the way Kelly behaved, it became apparent that it wasn't the happy show we all thought it was.

@kkschiller I think @michaelstrahan saw an opportunity to escape her manipulation and he took it. I don't blame him. Keep following his dreams. Now she pulls @RyanSeacrest strings so tight that he reports everything in his life like she's his mother. I feel she's supporting him for her brand
@willishl @kkschiller @KellyRipa We're talking about a dumb blonde that dissed pit bull type dogs on national television without thinking about what she was saying.

@kkschiller I think @michaelstrahan deserves an #Oscar for his performance on the show. I don't think he was ever fully embraced by her. It became apparent when a better opportunity came for him, and she made it about her. A "real" friend would've celebrated and not throw an adult tantrum.

@kkschiller yeah, i was actually thinking the same thing. Michael made a career decision and she treated him like dirt. Seacrest has credible accusations of sexual harassment and she defends the guy. @kellyripa
